steps.title: Use jute or natural fiber rope at least 5-7 mm (0.2-0.3 in) in diameter.
steps.content: Use jute or natural fiber rope at least 5-7 mm (0.2-0.3 in) in diameter. Stay away from thinner ropes since these can cut into the skin and affect circulation.
